=== About Me ===

  I am a twenty-four-year-old French PhD student. I have been a Linux user since I started computer engineering school (in 2003). I have a broad range of development interests in Ubuntu including Universe, Xfce, mentoring and community management (I have been the admin of the <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-fr.org|French forums for some years]]</nowiki>).
